trans-unit.source: Understand the service limitations of MySQL Database on Azure – Azure cloud
trans-unit.target: Understand the service limitations of MySQL Database on Azure – Azure cloud

trans-unit.source: This article helps you understand the service limitations of MySQL Database on Azure during the period of this public preview version.
trans-unit.target: This article helps you understand the service limitations of MySQL Database on Azure during the period of this public preview version.

trans-unit.source: Contact technical support if you have any questions about specific operations.
trans-unit.target: Contact technical support if you have any questions about specific operations.

trans-unit.source: Service limitations of MySQL Database on Azure
trans-unit.target: Service limitations of MySQL Database on Azure

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.SELECTOR]
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.SELECTOR]

trans-unit.source: Chinese Version
trans-unit.target: Chinese Version

trans-unit.source: English Version
trans-unit.target: English Version

trans-unit.source: MySQL Database on Azure currently has the following limitations.
trans-unit.target: MySQL Database on Azure currently has the following limitations.

trans-unit.source: If you have any questions, contact technical support.
trans-unit.target: If you have any questions, contact technical support.

trans-unit.source: As MySQL Database on Azure uses customized user account authentication plug-ins, user accounts can only be created in the Azure portal.
trans-unit.target: As MySQL Database on Azure uses customized user account authentication plug-ins, user accounts can only be created in the Azure portal.

trans-unit.source: Users cannot directly create database user accounts using the SQL command line.
trans-unit.target: Users cannot directly create database user accounts using the SQL command line.

trans-unit.source: You can create databases only by using the management portal.
trans-unit.target: You can create databases only by using the management portal.

trans-unit.source: Directly creating databases by using the SQL command line is not supported.
trans-unit.target: Directly creating databases by using the SQL command line is not supported.

trans-unit.source: Users do not have shutdown permissions, so users cannot shut down MySQL database servers.
trans-unit.target: Users do not have shutdown permissions, so users cannot shut down MySQL database servers.

trans-unit.source: Users do not have super permissions, and so cannot change any global variables, for example.
trans-unit.target: Users do not have super permissions, and so cannot change any global variables, for example.

trans-unit.source: Find out more about MySQL 5.5 user permissions
trans-unit.target: Find out more about MySQL 5.5 user permissions

trans-unit.source: Users do not have file permissions.
trans-unit.target: Users do not have file permissions.

trans-unit.source: [Find out more about MySQL 5.5 user permissions](https://dev.mysql.com/doc/refman/5.5/en/privileges-provided.html).
trans-unit.target: [Find out more about MySQL 5.5 user permissions](https://dev.mysql.com/doc/refman/5.5/en/privileges-provided.html).

trans-unit.source: The MySQL built-in system table does not support write permissions, and read/write permissions are currently not supported for the following tables:
trans-unit.target: The MySQL built-in system table does not support write permissions, and read/write permissions are currently not supported for the following tables:

trans-unit.source: columns_priv
trans-unit.target: columns_priv

trans-unit.source: db
trans-unit.target: db

trans-unit.source: general_log
trans-unit.target: general_log

trans-unit.source: host
trans-unit.target: host

trans-unit.source: ndb_binlog_index
trans-unit.target: ndb_binlog_index

trans-unit.source: plugin
trans-unit.target: plugin

trans-unit.source: procs_priv
trans-unit.target: procs_priv

trans-unit.source: servers
trans-unit.target: servers

trans-unit.source: slow_log
trans-unit.target: slow_log

trans-unit.source: tables_priv
trans-unit.target: tables_priv

trans-unit.source: user
trans-unit.target: user

trans-unit.source: proxies_priv
trans-unit.target: proxies_priv

trans-unit.source: Data replication currently supports only data syncing between local and cloud servers, a feature that makes it easier for users to build hybrid cloud scenarios.
trans-unit.target: Data replication currently supports only data syncing between local and cloud servers, a feature that makes it easier for users to build hybrid cloud scenarios.

trans-unit.source: The MyISAM storage engine is currently not supported.
trans-unit.target: The MyISAM storage engine is currently not supported.
